source.65587a21:
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
fig, (ax1, ax2, ax3,ax4) = plt.subplots(1,4,figsize=(22,5))

sns.swarmplot(x="culmen_length_mm", y="sex", hue='sex',data=peg_size,  ax=ax1)

sns.swarmplot(x="culmen_depth_mm", y="sex", hue='sex',data=peg_size,  ax=ax2)

sns.swarmplot(x="flipper_length_mm", y="sex", hue='sex', data=peg_size,  ax=ax3)

sns.swarmplot(x="body_mass_g", y="sex", hue='sex', data=peg_size,  ax=ax4)


plt.show()
